attributes.action: DVLA - to add a new category for vehicle classification - to add, Campervan
attributes.additional_details:
We recently bought and Campervan and sent off for the reclassification and was rejected due to it looking like a van - it’s hardly your everyday van!

Apppreciate that the police need to be able to identify a vehicle if stolen but a van with side windows it is not.

Many Campervan’s have pop top roofs bike racks and are styled - therefore relating to nothing that a van with windows would look like - oh and they also have a kitchen, bed etc.
attributes.background: DVLA have recently changed the classification of a Campervan conversion which used to be under  the classification of Motorhome, now all Campervan’s are being rejected and classified as a van with side windows - this is unacceptable and deserves the right to to have its own classification.
